name: Andy Linden
introduction: Andy Linden (April 5, 1922 in Brownsville, Pennsylvania  February 10, 1987 in Torrance, California) was a United States driver who competed in eight Indianapolis 500 races when it was in the Formula One calendar. His career ended when a piece of metal pierced his helmet and skull in a sprint car crash in 1957, rendering him wheelchair bound for the rest of his life.
